Detailed Description

standard output stream support class

This class defines a generic interface to C++ standard output streams.

To support the standard << operator one just need to inherit from this class and implements the print_to method.

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

virtual std::ostream& TREX::utils::ostreamable::print_to ( std::ostream &  out  )  const [protected, pure virtual]

output method

Parameters:
[in,out] out An output stream

This method is internally called by the standard output stream operator to write the value of current instance into out
